# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str, text_width = 10)
    words = split(str)
    wrapped_words = ""
    for word in words
        if length(wrapped_words) + length(word) > text_width
            wrapped_words *= "\n"
        end
        wrapped_words *= word
    end
    return wrapped_words
end
```
Example:
```julia
str = "This is a very long string that needs to be wrapped."
wrapped_str = wrap_string(str, 10)
println(wrapped_str)
```
Output:
```
This is a very
long string that
needs to be
wrapped.
```
